text: Pen anɨb sɨŋak nɨgɨnek, tap olap ñɨg solwala tek, mab mɨŋɨlaŋ sek jɨmñɨl glas tek kɨd yɨbɨl agɨl yek. Binɨb ogɨnap jakɨl yelak, ñɨg solwala tek yek gol anɨb sɨŋak. Kɨli pen tap ladek ak sek, kawnan nop tek gɨlɨlak ak sek, yɨb nop namba ak sek, kɨlop asɨk tep gɨl taw jɨsɨpuk gɨlak. God kɨlop tap gita tek keke ñek dɨlak.
